code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import postService from"../services/postService";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostsPage=()=>{const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{setLoading(true);const data=await postService.getAllPosts();setPosts(data.data);}catch(err){setError("Failed to fetch posts");}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchData();},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:["Error: ",error]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:post.title},post.id))});};export default PostsPage;
